      Base class for Actions.

      An Action that doesn't do anything.

    • Uses of ActionInterface in game

      Classes in game that implement ActionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AttackAction
      Special Action that allows the Actor to attack other Actors.
      class  ConvoAction
      Action that allows the Actor to talk by printing a message on the display.
      class  CraftAction
      Action that allows the Actor to craft an item into a weapon that can deal damage.
      class  EatAction
      Action that allows the player or humans to eat the food and heal its health.
      class  FertiliseAction
      Action that alllows farmer to fertlise the crop and decrease the ripe age by 10 turns
      class  HarvestBehaviour
      Class represents the Behaviour of harvesting a RIPE crop and return an Action that allows the Actor to harvest the crop when the crop is RIPE.
      class  MenuChoosingAction 
      class  QuitGameAction
      Action thta allows the player to end the game at any time.
      class  ShotGunShootingAction 
      class  SowAction
      Action that allows Actor to plant the crop
      class  SpawnZombieAction
      An action that spawns the zombie at the edge of the map randomly.
      class  StunBehaviour
      Class that generates the SunAction when the player is able to be stunend.
      class  VanishAction
      Action that makes an actor to disapppear from the map
